title: Nick Boles – 2022 Comments on Government’s Plan to Send Asylum Seekers to Rwanda
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Nick Boles, the former Conservative MP for Grantham and Stamford, on Twitter on 14 April 2022.
content: There are two ways a a British government could reduce the number of asylum seekers crossing the Channel by boat. One is to nurture good relations with our European neighbours and negotiate a deal like the Dublin Treaty. The other is to spend billions shipping them to Africa.
